response.overview: One night, Rose Blackwood vanishes from her parents’ house without a trace. Her room is left untouched, doors locked, no signs of a struggle. Days turn into weeks, and despite the absence of a body, the news eventually declares her dead.  As the town moves on, Rose’s closest friends refuse to accept the finality of her disappearance. Drawn together by doubt and unfinished questions, they begin to follow scattered clues and unsettling mysteries left behind in the quiet spaces Rose once occupied.  What they uncover challenges everything they believed about that night, about Rose, and about the thin line between being gone and being truly lost.
response.title: The Mystery of Rose Blackwood
